name: Cubism (itch) (Mike Kee)
description:
Hop, skip and jump (mainly the latter) over and under the grey obstacles on your unpausing quest to reach that elusive, invisible goal. 5 custom-made, probably pretty simple levels stand in your blocky path  to see the end - how many deaths will you rack up? 

Leave any criticism and potential bugs in the comments below - these will be added to the development log in due time. 

https://miketfkee.wixsite.com/website/post/tdemo-week-2-make-a-1-button-game

Current issues:

- Death Counter does not carry over to consequent levels

- Autoscrolling speed is erratic
